Articles.Content:
Haven't had time to play in a while now, but finally got a little time this weekend. Was watching Miyasaki's Nausicaa again, and got inspired to build her Mehve!

What do you think? There's an external command seat for a brave Kerbal to try, but haven't figured out how to convince one to get into it She's actually able to land and take off with vertical thrusting as well

Can post craft file later if anyone is interested.
[offtop] If you like the film, I totally recommend you read the manga, it's even better, the storyline is much more complex and the setting is amazingly detailed. [/offtop]

[offtop] If you like the film, I totally recommend you read the manga, it's even better, the storyline is much more complex and the setting is amazingly detailed. [/offtop]

I just finished it the other day actually =) The movie was great, but the manga really fleshed out everything so much more. Was interesting to see what they kept in the movie, and what they didn't or changed.

....and I just noticed that I apparently only have 5 posts, must have lost all my other ones when the forum got rebuilt a while back. Oh well.

Convinced Jeb to try it. I think he likes it =)

And successfully landed too!
